mapper.select: SELECT order_id, user_id, tb_spot_order_time.spot_id, tb_spot_order_time.start_time, tb_spot_order_time.end_time, order_date, order_status, note, tb_spot.spot_name FROM tb_order, tb_spot, tb_spot_order_time WHERE tb_spot.spot_id = tb_spot_order_time.spot_id and tb_order.order_time = tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id ORDER BY order_date DESC, start_time DESC, end_time DESC

SELECT order_id, user_id, tb_spot_order_time.spot_id, tb_spot_order_time.start_time, tb_spot_order_time.end_time, order_date, order_status, note, tb_spot.spot_name FROM tb_order, tb_spot, tb_spot_order_time WHERE user_id = #{userId} and tb_spot.spot_id = tb_spot_order_time.spot_id and tb_order.order_time = tb_spot_order_time.spot_order_time_id ORDER BY order_date DESC, start_time DESC, end_time DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order(user_id, order_date, order_time, note) VALUES (#{userId}, #{orderDate}, (SELECT spot_order_time_id FROM tb_spot_order_time WHERE spot_id = #{spotId} and start_time = #{startTime} and end_time = #{endTime}), #{note})
